en.title: Testimonial - Quantum Pendant
en.content:
Prom Meesawat, Thai Professional Golfer.

 
 
Prom Meesawat,  24 years old Thai Professional Golfer had registered 6 top-tens in 2007, including third-place finishes at the Bangkok Airways Open and Johnnie Walker Cambodian Open He also competed in Maybank Malaysian Open and finished tie-seventh place.  In 2006, Prom claimed his maiden title at SK Telecom in Korea beating  well known golfers such as Choi Kyung Ju, Jeef Milkha Singh and Michelle Wee.  He went on to finish "Third" on the Asia Tour Order of Merit.  He earned  US$905,448 income after turned pro in 2006.

Prom Meesawat was rated as one of the best Asian Junior Golfers.  He won The Asia Pacific Junior Championships from 1996 to 2002 and was the major force of the Thai National Team that dominated the Putra Cup on numerous occasions. He also won the Junior World Championship in 1997 and 2002 in San Diego, USA.  He was the youngest Thai who won a tournament against the pros on the Thai Circuit as an amateur in 1999 when he was only 15 years old.

Prom is very impressed with FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant as the pendant has helped eased  his back-pain and recovery. He told Vivat Vilaitanrak, FusionExcel's Leader in Thailand, that his father told him about FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant before and he is so glad to own one for himself now!

meta.description: Prom is very impressed with FE's Quantum Pendant as the pendant has helped eased his back-pain and recovery.
